profile.description: Junior programmer with experience in PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Java, and Python. I have worked with frameworks such as Laravel and managed databases with MySQL. My Full Stack profile allows me to develop both frontend and backend, adapting to agile methodologies like Scrum and Kanban. I am always looking to improve my skills and learn new technologies to become a better professional. My goal is to continue improving in my passion for developing robust and efficient web applications, optimizing projects with good practices and agile methodologies.

experience.first-job-description:
I worked with PHP and Laravel, using Kanban. I coordinated a team, managing both frontend and backend. I was in charge of backend development and testing with Pest in TDD.
This experience improved my technical and leadership skills, and I delved deeper into agile good practices.

projects.first-project-description: A to-do list is a simple but useful web application that allows users to manage their tasks. The application was created with Laravel, a database, and Bootstrap
